dcterms:creator: D. Loureiro
K. Rezaee
M. T. Pilehvar
J. Camacho-Collados
dcterms:description: A dataset for figuring out the actual meaning of words that can have different meanings, made from Wikipedia and focusing on 20 nouns with 2 to 5 different meanings. It contains 10,196 cases, making it suitable for evaluating word sense disambiguation models.
dcterms:title: CoarseWSD-20
